p: In the present study, a synergistic action was observed in the evaluation of the effects of the associations between doxycycline and the essential oil of Ageratum conyzoides L., resulting in a reduction of up to 4.89 times the IC 50 of DOX (see TableÂ 2). The confirmation of the synergistic effects of the essential oil was obtained with the construction of the isobolograms type graphs which show a curve close to the axes for the studied specimen. This assessment suggests that Ageratum conyzoides L. is a plant with important and significant antimicrobial activity.
